author: djd
msg: Update the SQL script JUnit test running (ScriptTestCase) to use the new ij.runScript. This allows
the scripts to easily use the default connection from the super class BaseJDBCTest without having
to resort to setting system properties.
Cleanup the LangScripts test case to allow it to be called as a main method to run arbitrary

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1638 Add methods to JDBC for JUnit that indicates if the virtual machine environment
supports JDBC 2,3 or 4 and JSR169. Naming of methods indicates that the define the vm
level of support rather than the clients level.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor fix to model diagram, removed obsolete attribute from PropertyType

author: jsdelfino
msg: Added a getDataFactory method to ModuleContext, same as the getDataFactory method already on ComponentContext

author: jsdelfino
msg: Changed AccountService web service to be a proper doc-literal-wrapped web service, using elements and anonymous complex types wrappering the input and output parameters. Adjusted the AccountService class to flow the actual parameters instead of the wrappers. Also removed all the calls to XSDHelper.defineFile which are not necessary as long as AccountService.wsdl is registered in Tuscany-Model.config.
